title: Nordstrom's Spring Sale Is on, and I'm Shocked These 14 Beauty Products Are Still in Stock
excerpt: Our beauty director shares the best on-sale beauty products to buy while they're still available at Nordstrom.
text: Certain times of the year are practically synonymous with big schmancy sales. The holiday season, back to school… you get the idea. So, sometimes, truly stellar money-saving opportunities fly under the radar. Such was the case when I stole a glance at the beauty offerings currently on sale at Nordstrom and noticed a large number of products I couldn't believe were actually still available.As a beauty director, I have to do my due diligence and share the 14 products, in particular, I can't get my mind off of. I'm sure they won't be around for long, so I highly recommend making your move sooner rather than later. Keep scrolling! BAGGALLINI Travel Toiletry Kit Cosmetic Bag This glossy black bag might just be one of the chicest toiletry cases I've ever laid eyes on. Tory Burch Kira Metallic Moto Quilted Leather Vanity Train Case Then again, there's always this gold Tory Burch number… NUME Pentacle 2-In-1 Curling Wand and Deep Waver I'm such a sucker for waves, especially once summer rolls around. I also love a multi-tasking tool, so this 2-in-1 curling iron and waver has my full attention. Ellis Brooklyn Salt Scented Body Oil Meet one of my all-time favorite Ellis Brooklyn scents, Salt. It's truly one of the best summer fragrances IMO, and I always tell people that it's exactly how I'd guess a mermaid would smell. I adore it as a glistening body oil. Benefit Cosmetics Big Time Brow Minis Set Don't check out without adding two of the most iconic brow products money can buy to your shopping cart. PURSONIC Total Comfort Package Neck & Shoulder Warmer + Electric Heat Pad This might not be the sexiest item on my shopping list, but as someone who sleeps like a circus contortionist, a supremely soft neck and shoulder warmer sounds like absolute bliss. Boy Smells Violet Ends Genderful Fine Fragrance Nothing feels more kismet than when your favorite Boy Smells perfume, Violet Ends, is the one and only scent from the brand you can snag for $20 less than usual. PURSONIC Ultimate Teeth Whitening & Oral Care Bundle Take it from someone who has had their teeth professionally whitened multiple times… at-home teeth whitening options are just as—if not more—effective. I love that this set includes a LED whitening tray (my favorite method), whitening strips, and a crème de la crème electric toothbrush. PURSONIC Pore Vacuum Blackhead Remover There is nothing, and I mean nothing, more satisfying than a blackhead-banishing vacuum like this one from Pursonic. If you're like me and start to get lazy about your skincare once spring and summer arrive, this will be a game-changer. CRUSHED TONIC Chocolate Mylk Marine Collagen Supplement It's no secret that collagen is often touted for its hair-boosting benefits, but I was always a cynic. Until, that is, I started regularly blending it into my morning coffee. After a few months, my baffled colorist couldn't stop gushing over how much heartier my fine hair felt. Since the addition of collagen is all that had changed in my routine, I'm forced to say it's the culprit! One note—if chocolate isn't your thing, there are other delicious flavors on sale like strawberry, vanilla, banana, matcha, honeydew… the list goes on. PURSONIC Eucalyptus Flower Multi Use Body Oil I'm obsessed with trying to make my shower ritual as luxurious and spa-like as possible. I'm already picturing how pretty this Eucalyptus-spiked multi-purpose oil will look on my vanity. PURSONIC Ultimate Relaxation Bundle 3-Speed Massage Gun & Palm-Shaped Massage Glove Turns out, you don't actually have to spend a fortune for an at-home massage gun. $45 is such a great price point, and it's safe to say this is about to become my favorite new ritual while watching White Lotus. PURSONIC 100% Natural Coconut Oil Hair Mask Sometimes simpler is just better. I've had so many celebrity hairstylists tell me they recommend using high-quality coconut or olive oil as an at-home hair mask and shine treatment. I have absolutely zero skill when it comes to styling my own hair. I've found that wands, like this on-sale model from Nume, are pretty much fool-proof. Erin has been writing a mix of beauty and wellness content for Who What Wear for over five years. Prior to that, she spent two and half years writing for Byrdie. She now calls Santa Monica home but grew up in Minnetonka, Minnesota, and studied writing, rhetoric, and communication at University of Wisconsin, La Crosse. She studied abroad in Galway, Ireland, and spent a summer in L.A. interning with the Byrdie and Who What Wear family. After graduating from UW, she spent one year in San Francisco, where she worked as a writer for Pottery Barn Kids and PBteen before moving down to L.A. to begin her career as a beauty editor.
html:
Certain times of the year are practically synonymous with big schmancy sales. The holiday season, back to school… you get the idea. So, sometimes, truly stellar money-saving opportunities fly under the radar. Such was the case when I stole a glance at the beauty offerings currently on sale at Nordstrom and noticed a large number of products I couldn't believe were actually still available.

As a beauty director, I have to do my due diligence and share the 14 products, in particular, I can't get my mind off of. I'm sure they won't be around for long, so I highly recommend making your move sooner rather than later. Keep scrolling!

BAGGALLINI

Travel Toiletry Kit Cosmetic Bag

This glossy black bag might just be one of the chicest toiletry cases I've ever laid eyes on.

Tory Burch

Kira Metallic Moto Quilted Leather Vanity Train Case

Then again, there's always this gold Tory Burch number…

NUME

Pentacle 2-In-1 Curling Wand and Deep Waver

I'm such a sucker for waves, especially once summer rolls around. I also love a multi-tasking tool, so this 2-in-1 curling iron and waver has my full attention.

Ellis Brooklyn

Salt Scented Body Oil

Meet one of my all-time favorite Ellis Brooklyn scents, Salt. It's truly one of the best summer fragrances IMO, and I always tell people that it's exactly how I'd guess a mermaid would smell. I adore it as a glistening body oil.

Benefit Cosmetics

Big Time Brow Minis Set

Don't check out without adding two of the most iconic brow products money can buy to your shopping cart.

PURSONIC

Total Comfort Package Neck & Shoulder Warmer + Electric Heat Pad

This might not be the sexiest item on my shopping list, but as someone who sleeps like a circus contortionist, a supremely soft neck and shoulder warmer sounds like absolute bliss.

Boy Smells

Violet Ends Genderful Fine Fragrance

Nothing feels more kismet than when your favorite Boy Smells perfume, Violet Ends, is the one and only scent from the brand you can snag for $20 less than usual.

PURSONIC

Ultimate Teeth Whitening & Oral Care Bundle

Take it from someone who has had their teeth professionally whitened multiple times… at-home teeth whitening options are just as—if not more—effective. I love that this set includes a LED whitening tray (my favorite method), whitening strips, and a crème de la crème electric toothbrush.

PURSONIC

Pore Vacuum Blackhead Remover

There is nothing, and I mean nothing, more satisfying than a blackhead-banishing vacuum like this one from Pursonic. If you're like me and start to get lazy about your skincare once spring and summer arrive, this will be a game-changer.

CRUSHED TONIC

Chocolate Mylk Marine Collagen Supplement

It's no secret that collagen is often touted for its hair-boosting benefits, but I was always a cynic. Until, that is, I started regularly blending it into my morning coffee. After a few months, my baffled colorist couldn't stop gushing over how much heartier my fine hair felt. Since the addition of collagen is all that had changed in my routine, I'm forced to say it's the culprit! One note—if chocolate isn't your thing, there are other delicious flavors on sale like strawberry, vanilla, banana, matcha, honeydew… the list goes on.

PURSONIC

Eucalyptus Flower Multi Use Body Oil

I'm obsessed with trying to make my shower ritual as luxurious and spa-like as possible. I'm already picturing how pretty this Eucalyptus-spiked multi-purpose oil will look on my vanity.

PURSONIC

Ultimate Relaxation Bundle 3-Speed Massage Gun & Palm-Shaped Massage Glove

Turns out, you don't actually have to spend a fortune for an at-home massage gun. $45 is such a great price point, and it's safe to say this is about to become my favorite new ritual while watching White Lotus.

PURSONIC

100% Natural Coconut Oil Hair Mask

Sometimes simpler is just better. I've had so many celebrity hairstylists tell me they recommend using high-quality coconut or olive oil as an at-home hair mask and shine treatment.

I have absolutely zero skill when it comes to styling my own hair. I've found that wands, like this on-sale model from Nume, are pretty much fool-proof.

Erin has been writing a mix of beauty and wellness content for Who What Wear for over five years. Prior to that, she spent two and half years writing for Byrdie. She now calls Santa Monica home but grew up in Minnetonka, Minnesota, and studied writing, rhetoric, and communication at University of Wisconsin, La Crosse. She studied abroad in Galway, Ireland, and spent a summer in L.A. interning with the Byrdie and Who What Wear family. After graduating from UW, she spent one year in San Francisco, where she worked as a writer for Pottery Barn Kids and PBteen before moving down to L.A. to begin her career as a beauty editor.
